feed.title: Jack Myrick's personal site - Hello world

entry.title: Mentor introduction
entry.summary: I just got sent your names and emails, and I've quickly set up this site we can use. I'll post communication, resources, and other things here. For a brief introduction about me, click here. I'll contact you later with more info, as I need to sleep now. I'll be moving in tomorrow.

entry.title: Welcome to my personal site
entry.summary: Hello UTD, I'm Jack Myrick! I am an undergraduate studying computer science and mathematics in my senior year. I've interned at Amazon and Noblis as a software development engineer. I've also done research that has been submitted to and rejected by a couple of conferences :)
